article.headline: Belmont 76, Gardner-Webb 73
article.story: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) -- Andy Wicke hit a three-pointer with 46 seconds left to put Belmont ahead by one as the Bruins beat Gardner-Webb 76-73 Saturday. After giving Belmont the lead, Wicke then sank two free throws to secure the victory. Grayson Flittner missed a potential game-tying three-pointer in the final moments for Gardner-Webb (15-15, 9-7 Atlantic Sun Conference). Cold Bruin shooting led to a furious finish which saw seven ties and three lead changes down the stretch. With the win, Belmont (22-8, 14-2) capped an undefeated home conference season and secured its first-ever outright Atlantic Sun Conference regular season championship. Alex Renfroe led the Bruins with 17 points, followed by Wicke with 16. Shane Dansby added 15 and Matthew Dotson 14. Dansby also was Belmont's leading rebounder with nine. Thomas Sanders scored 21 points for the Runnin' Bulldogs. Flittner had 17, while Nate Blank and Aaron Linn added 13 apiece. Blank also had 14 rebounds, and Sanders 12.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
